title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
**Introducing the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils: A Timeless Favorite for Creative Minds**

For over a century, Ticonderoga has been synonymous with exceptional writing instruments. Our pre-sharpened wood-cased pencils are a testament to our commitment to quality and craftsmanship. With their exclusive #2 graphite formula, thick core, and premium wood harvested from responsibly managed forests, these pencils provide a smooth writing experience that's unmatched in the industry.

**The Perfect Blend of Tradition and Innovation**

Our pencils feature a golden yellow lacquered finish with a matte coating, ensuring they remain durable and easy to handle. The latex-free eraser is designed for smudge-free removal of marks, making it perfect for artists, students, and professionals alike. And with our PMA certified non-toxic safety seal, you can trust that our pencils are safe for use by people of all ages.

**Why Teachers Prefer Ticonderoga**

For over 100 years, Ticonderoga has been the preferred choice of teachers and educators worldwide. Our pencils have earned a reputation for their reliability, consistency, and ability to bring out the best in students' creative work. With our exclusive #2 graphite formula and thick core, you can trust that your writing will be precise, smooth, and long-lasting.

**30 Count Pack: Perfect for Any Setting**

Our 30-count pack of pre-sharpened wood-cased pencils is ideal for classrooms, art studios, offices, or personal use. Whether you're a student, teacher, artist, or professional, these pencils are the perfect tool to help you bring your ideas to life.

**Experience the Ticonderoga Difference**

Don't settle for ordinary writing instruments. Choose the best and make a statement with our Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils. With their exceptional quality, durability, and performance, you'll wonder how you ever managed without them. Order now and discover why Ticonderoga has been the trusted choice of creative minds for over a century!

The latex-free eraser removes marks completely without smudging, making it easy to correct mistakes. Our pencils are PMA certified non-toxic, ensuring a safe writing experience for students of all ages.

**A Timeless Favorite Among Teachers**

With over 100 years of tradition behind us, Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils have become a staple in many classrooms. Teachers prefer our pencils for their consistent performance and durability, making them an essential tool for any art or education project.

**Get Your Hands on a Set Today!**

Indulge your creativity with a set of 30 Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow Wood-Cased Pencils from Ticonderoga. Perfect for students, artists, and anyone who appreciates the joy of writing and drawing.

Order now and experience the difference that only Ticonderoga can provide!
